subject: Suite improvement
msgSnippet: AFAIK this feature is replacement to TestSuite in JUnit 3.8. But it is less flexible then TestSuite. In JUnit 3.8 you have an option to add some methods from
messageBody:
AFAIK this feature is replacement to TestSuite in JUnit 3.8. But it is
less flexible then TestSuite. In JUnit 3.8 you have an option to add
some methods from one class and some methods from the another class.
See also related topic "Filter improvement". I think this
functionality should be available also here, perhaps, with futher
improvement, such as use of patterns.
At least one should be able to run couples of methods from the given
class. When I have some related tests I preferred to run them
altogether and to look what is fails. It helps me both to save the
time and to identify the problem. I feel lack of this in JUnit 4.
